resources.string: To activate app, scan the activation QR from the Portal
Open the Portal and select Activate mobile app from the menu and follow the QR instructions
Or use the manual activation URL
Place a barcode inside the rectangle to scan it.
The mobile app is not currently enabled for your HPE Service Anywhere portal. For details, contact your IT.

Something is wrong in the URL link.
Check it and try again.

If the problem persists, contact your administrator.
